str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Envy, a grudge, spite. Probably akin to the base of phtheiro; ill-will, i.e. Jealousy.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.
